attributes.action: To stop disabled children and adults being changed on dirty toilet floors.
attributes.additional_details:
There are changing places toilets where there is hoist and changing table but they are not in many places.

If the government make changing places facilities "mandatory" rather than "desirable" under building regulations for all places stated in BS8300:2009" This would help the disabled community and families like mine.
attributes.background: I'm a mum of two children with complex medical and physical needs. When I'm out with them I need a toilet where I can change them dignifyed  and not on a smelly dirty toilet floor! It spoils days out as a family as we can't leave them in soiled pads.
